records.context_note: A boat reportedly carrying 27 people was in distress off Chios Island, Greece. A Search and Rescue (SAR) operation was launched involving the Hellenic Coast Guard, a German NATO vessel, and helicopters. The operation resulted in 22 people rescued, 4 dead bodies recovered (3 children and 1 woman), and 2 people remaining missing. The report also highlights potential fundamental rights violations and the response from Hellenic authorities.
records.evidence_quote: The SAR operation was concluded with the following result: 22 migrants rescued, 4 corpses recovered, 2 migrants missing.
